children.name: Example - filter a range with dates

parameters.name: options `Object`
parameters.description: An object which should have a `type` field set to:* `"belowAverage"`, `"aboveAverage"`, `"bottomPercent"`, or `"bottomNumber"` for numbers.* `"tomorrow"`, `"today"`, `"yesterday"`, `"nextWeek"`, `"thisWeek"`, `"lastWeek"`, `"nextMonth"`, `"thisMonth"`, `"lastMonth"`, `"nextQuarter"`, `"thisQuarter"`,`"lastQuarter"`, `"nextYear"`, `"thisYear"`, `"lastYear"`, `"yearToDate"` for date fields. `"quarter1"`, `"quarter2"`, `"quarter3"`, `"quarter4"` and month (en-US) names are also accepted.
